title: Cute 2BR/2BA home with huge yard and parking!
description:
This is a unique, 1,700+ square feet freestanding home in the sought after riverside section of Fishtown, complete with tons of natural light and mature birch and magnolia trees. Situated on the corner of Shackamaxon St and Wildey St with a large yard and 1-car garage parking!
The location is perfect: 1 block to Barcade, 2 blocks to Frankford Hall, 3 blocks to Middle Child, 4 blocks to Penn Treaty Park and so much more! Less than a 5 minute walk to the Market Frankford Line at Girard & Front, and easy access to/from I-95.
As you enter the home you're greeted by a spacious open-concept living room with newly refinished hardwood flooring. Through the living room and into the oversized eat-in kitchen (with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and garbage disposal) you have plenty space to add a dining table or kitchen island and then some. Past the kitchen you have your first full bathroom with stackable washer/dryer, a wet bar with wine fridge and access to your enclosed sunroom which is one of the more unique features of this Fishtown home.
Off the sunroom is your composite deck that gives you plenty of room to entertain during the warmer months and host your friends and family with little to no maintenance required. You also have plenty of room in the back and side yard for gardening and outdoor activities. There is a storage shed to include all of your gardening equipment and tools as well as a 1-car garage you can access from the backyard.
Back inside, upstairs you have two bedrooms and another renovated, full bathroom with tub shower and white subway tile. Inside the primary bedroom you also have access to the third floor attic which could easily be used as a den or office space. Full basement is clean and dry with plenty of room for storage.
*Disclaimer: Exterior photos have been adjusted to show how the grass would look*
Listed and managed by property owner.
Renter is responsible for all utilities including gas, electric, and water. Well trained and quiet pets are welcome with pet addendum. Non smoking.
Security deposit due at agreement. First month and last month due prior to move in date. Credit/background check. Available in May.

title: Walk through the front garden into a gorgeous sun room!
description:
Tucked away on a quiet, tree-lined and cobblestone street, this unique twin is move-in ready. Walk through the front garden into a gorgeous sun room where you can hang your hat and kick off your shoes. The calm is already beginning to set in! Step into the living room with gorgeous parquet hardwood floors and get cozy by the wood burning stove. The open kitchen / dining concept is perfect for entertaining or hanging with your family and friends while you cook. Outside - the backyard is a luscious getaway including a green community alley called Hollyhock Lane! Imagine taking a relaxing nap in a hammock, dining al' fresco or enjoying a warm moment of sun. Upstairs you'll find three perfectly sized rooms with closets and a full bath. The clean, dry basement is where you will find the laundry and tons of unfinished storage space! This home has all the historic charm you'll want in a perfect manageable size. A block from the Tulpehocken Station Historic District as well as many historical sites, this part of West Germantown is full of eclectic 19th century residential architecture and mature trees of all kinds. The Wissahickon is just blocks away along with Blue Bell Hill and Vernon Park. The neighborhood has many places to eat, drink and shop and is welcoming new businesses all the time like Germantown Espresso Bar, Young American Cider and Pomelo.
Send an email with a valid number to view your new home!!!!

title: Looking for luxury lviing in a prime location?
description: Looking for luxury lviing in a prime location? Look no further than this exeptional two bedroom, one bathroom condo with extensive upgrades. From the moment you step inside this spacious unit, you'll be greeted with high end flooring and an abundance of natural light. This unit has been completely remodeled with no expenses spared, including recessed lighting in the living room and all new light fixtures throughout, including a stunning Kelly Wrestler Chandelier in the dinning room.
